Description: As a QA Engineer I want comprehensive unit tests for transcription module So that we catch bugs early in individual components
Acceptance Criteria: Unit tests for audio validation format conversion Whisper API calls; Test coverage 80 percent or greater for transcription module; Tests run in less than 30 seconds; Mock external dependencies Whisper API

Summary: Unit Tests for AI Agent Extraction Logic
Description: As a QA Engineer I want unit tests for content extraction functions So that AI Agent logic is validated independently
Acceptance Criteria: Tests for action item extraction owner assignment date parsing; Test coverage 75 percent or greater for AI Agent module; Use sample transcripts as test fixtures; Validate precision/recall metrics

Description: As a QA Engineer I want integration tests for all REST API endpoints So that API contracts are validated end-to-end
Acceptance Criteria: Tests for upload transcribe extract export sync endpoints; Test authentication authorization error handling; Verify response formats and status codes; Tests run against test database

Summary: System Tests for Complete User Workflows
